metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12922 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
A CSRF issue in phpMyAdmin 4.9.0.1 allows deletion of any server in theSetup page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12922` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.5.4.1-2ubuntu2.1+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:4.5.4.1-2ubuntu2.1+esm3').
